title: A relation of a very sudden and extraordinary cure of a person bitten by a viper, by the means of acids together with some remarks upon Dr. Tuthill's vindication of his objections against the doctrine of acids : wherein are contained several things in order to the further clearing of the said doctrine / by John Colbatch.
author: Colbatch, John, Sir, 1670-1729.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Dan. Brown ..., Abel Roper ..., and Tho. Leigh ...,
